name: Sherlock Holmes vs. Jack the Ripper
name_original: Sherlock Holmes vs. Jack the Ripper
description:
Sherlock Holmes vs. Jack the Ripper is an adventure game developed by Frogwares and Spiders. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Focus Home Interactive. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Sherlock Holmes vs. Jack the Ripper on PC.
